name: Genesis Trousers
tooltip:
Genesis TrousersLevel 60

Bring the Skin of the Great Sandworm, 2 Idols of War, 5 Stone Scarabs and 5 Crystal Scarabs to Kandrostrasz inside Ahn'Qiraj. You must also attain Friendly reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Skin of the Great Sandworm
- Idol of War x 2
- Stone Scarab x 5
- Crystal Scarab x 5
- Brood of Nozdormu:
